data.title: Other Books Received
data.text:
In lieu of an abstract, here is a brief excerpt of the content:

OTHER BOOKS RECEIVED [Books that were sent to scholars to be reviewed but of which no review has been received are indicated by an asterisk.] Augustine, Saint. The Augustine Catechism. Volume I: The Enchiridion on Faith, Hope and Love. Trans. Bruce Harbert; Trans. John E. Rotelle, O.S.A. [The Augustine Series.] (Hyde Park, NY.: New City Press. 1999. Pp. 144. Paperback .) "Barrell, A. D. M. The Papacy, Scotland and Northern England, 1342-1378. [Cambridge Studies in Medieval Life and Thought, Fourth Series, 30.] (New York: Cambridge University Press. 1995. Pp. xxvi, 291.) Barresi, Sandra, and Angela Gandoln (Eds.). GU archivi del Centro ricerche Giuseppe Di Vittorio:Inventan. [Pubblicazioni degli Archivi di Stato, Strumenti CXXXV] (Rome: Ministero per i beni culturali e ambientali, Ufficio centrale per i beni archivistici. 1998. Pp. x, 454. Paperback.) Bernanos, Georges. The Heroic Face of Innocence: Three Stories. [Ressourcement : Retrieval & Renewal in Catholic Thought.] (Grand Rapids, Mich.: William B. Eerdmans Publishing Company; Edinburghs & T Clark. 1999. Pp. xii, 150. $1300 paperback.) Blet, Pierre, SJ. Pius XII and the Second World War:According to theArchives of the Vatican. Trans. Lawrence J. Johnson. (Mahwah, N.J.: Paulist Press. 1999· Pp. xv, 304. $29-95.) Originally published in French and reviewed by John Jay Hughes ante (April, 1999), pp. 268-270. "Bodo, Murray, O.F.M. (Trans, and Ed.). Tales of an Endishodi: Father Berard Hatte and the Navajos, 1900-1961. (Albuquerque: University of New Mexico Press. 1998. Pp. xvi, 263· Paperback.) "Bolton, Brenda. Innocent III: Studies on PapalAuthority and Pastoral Care. [Variorum Collected Studies Series.] (Brookfield, Vt.: Variorum, Ashgate Publishing Co. 1995. Pp. xvi, 318. $82.50.) Boyd, Mark E, Hale G. Smith and John W Griffin. Here They Once Stood: The Tragic End oftheApalachee Missions. [Southeastern Classics in Archaeology , Anthropology, and History.] (Gainesville: University Press of Florida. 1999. Pp. xxi, 189, 12 plates. $29.95 paperback.) Originally published in 1951 and reviewed by MichaelJ. Curley ante,XXXVIII (April, 1952), 48-49. Bresslau, Harry. Manuale di diplomática per la Germania e Vitalia. Trans. Anna Maria Voci-Roth. [Pubblicazioni degli Archivi di Stato, Sussidi 10.] 709 710OTHER BOOKS RECEIVED (Rome: Ministero per i beni culturali e ambientali, Ufficio centrale per i beni archivistici. 1998. Pp. lxxxvi, 1423) Conley Carolyn A. Melancholy Accidents: The Meaning of Violence in PostFamine Ireland. (Lanham, Md.: Lexington Books. 1999. Pp. xii, 249. $40.00.) Crowe, Michael J. The Extraterrestrial Life Debate, 1 750-1900. (Mineóla, N.Y: Dover Publications, Inc. 1999. Pp. xxiv, 680. $ 19.95 paperback.) Originally published by Cambridge University Press in 1986. This edition has new prefaces. Dellacasa, Sabina (Ed.). / Libri Iurium della Repubblica di Genova,\61. 1/4. [Regione Liguria - Assessorato alla Cultura, Società Ligure di Storia Patria, Fonti per la storia della Liguria, XI; Pubblicazioni degli Archivi di Stato, Fonti XXVIII.] (Rome: Ministero per i beni e le attività culturali, Ufficio centrale per i beni archivistici. 1998. Pp. xxx, 613) Dixon, C. Scott (Ed.). The German Reformation: The Essential Readings. [Blackwell Essential Readings in History.] (Maiden, Mass.: Blackwell Publishers . 1999· Pp. vii, 288. $26.95.) Five of the eight previously published essays have been translated from German. Dolega, Józef Marceli, and Józef Wojciech Czartoszewski (Eds.). Ochrona srodowiska w ftlozofii i teologii. (Warsaw: Wydawnictwo Akademii Teologii Katolickiej. 1999. Pp. 295. Paperback.) Eigo, Francis A., O.S.A. (Ed.). At the Threshold of the Third Millennium. [Proceedings of the Theology Institute ofVillanova University, Volume XXX.] (Villanova, Pa.: The Villanova University Press. 1998. Pp. xi, 202. Paperback .) Eigo, Francis A., O.S.A. (Ed.). Religious Values at the Threshold ofthe ThirdMillennium . [Proceedings of the Theology Institute of Villanova University, Volume XXXI.] (Villanova,Pa..TheVillanova University Press. 1999. Pp.xiii, 228. Paperback.) Fausto,Boris.A Concise History ofBrazil. Trans. Arthur Brakel. (NewYork: Cambridge University Press. 1999. Pp. xiii, 362. $4995 hardback; $16.95 paperback .) Franzese, Paolo (Ed.). Archivio di Gabinetto della Sottoprefettura pot Prefettura di Pistoia (1861-1944). [Pubblicazioni degli Archivi di Stato, Strumenti CXXXTV; Archivio di Stato di Pistoia.] (Rome: Ministero per i beni culturali e ambientali, Ufficio centrale per i beni archivistici. 1998. Pp. x, 350.
